snippet.title: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League Official Gameplay Trailer - “Flash and Burn”
snippet.description:
Task Force X has a target: Kill the Flash or die trying.
     
Check out the first official #GameplayTrailer of #SuicideSquadGame and experience how each super-villain's unique abilities combine to create chaos in Metropolis.    
Coming in 2022 to PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC. 
-
Learn more: https://www.suicidesquadgame.com/ 

Connect with Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League Online:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/suicidesquadRS 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SuicideSquadRocksteady 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/suicidesquadrs/ 
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/SuicideSquadRS 

Official Rocksteady Channels:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/RocksteadyGames 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/rocksteadygames/ 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RocksteadyGames/
